item.title: Debbie add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Debbie add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you can, with what you have, where you are." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Debbie add a quote by E.B. White
item.description: "If the world were merely seductive, that would be easy. If it were merely challenging, that would be no problem. But I arise in the morning torn between a desire to improve the world and a desire to enjoy the world. This makes it hard to plan the day." -- E.B. White

item.title: Debbie add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Debbie add a quote by A.A. Milne
Debbie add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "I believe in Christianity as I believe that the sun has risen: not only because I see it, but because by it I see everything else." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Debbie add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "Happiness is a warm puppy." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Debbie add a quote by Aldous Huxley
item.description: "Facts do not cease to exist because they are ignored." -- Aldous Huxley

item.title: Debbie add a quote by Robert Louis Stevenson
item.description: "Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant." -- Robert Louis Stevenson

item.title: Debbie add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, Nothing is going to get better. It's not." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Debbie add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "Anyone who thinks sitting in church can make you a Christian must also think that sitting in a garage can make you a car." -- Garrison Keillor

item.title: Debbie add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Debbie add a quote by St. Francis Of Assisi
item.description: "All the darkness in the world cannot extinguish the light of a single candle." -- St. Francis Of Assisi
